DS1307:
Use this file to define custom functions and blocks.
Read more at https://makecode.microbit.org/blocks/custom

DS1307 block
DS1307.DateTime|param|day: is the Day will be set, eg: 17
DS1307.DateTime|param|hour: is the Hour will be set, eg: 12
DS1307.DateTime|param|minute: is the Minute will be set, eg: 31
DS1307.DateTime|param|month: is the Month will be set, eg: 1
DS1307.DateTime|param|second: is the Second will be set, eg: 19
DS1307.DateTime|param|year: is the Year will be set, eg: 2019
DS1307.getWeekday:
get time

get  weekday
0 means Sunday
1 means Monday
2 means Tuesday
3 means Wednesday
4 means Thursday
5 means Friday
6 means Saturday
